channel.title: Newfag here need help! Want to build my very own Base server!
channel.description:
[b]I want to create my very own base client from scratch - Copying is for losers[/b] :D
Okay I'll start with saying [b]my knowledge in Java is VERY limited[/b]. I tried learning from youtube vids a while back (I know horrible). I'll take all your insults because I know how annoying it is to help people new to something you know a lot about.
Any who, I'm [b]hoping there is a guide for dummies[/b] of some sort.. I [b]don't want to take someone else's base client[/b] because I [b]don't want to learn bad habits[/b]. I actually want to try building my very own server from scratch.
Now I know the logical thing to do here would to give me something small to start with... But don't please. I'm hoping one of you coding experts will give me a hand. What I mean is I've[b] heard talk about this Apache Ant thing being the way to go (have no idea what it is exactly)[/b].. none of this small time shit :P
So if someone can point me in the right direction.. [b]A guide relevant to only making Runescape Private servers from Scratch AND I MEAN SCRATCH[/b]. Thats all I'm interested in at the moment.
[b]My Goals[/b] * Create a Base Client * I know how to port forward etc. * Already know how to spawn nps, get them to walk and teleports etc * Spawn shops (had trouble with this one, but it may have been a bad base client - not from this site). * Altar/create terrain and buildings/structures (have a mate with a diploma in 3D Animation) * Altar/create models [i]This is all for now[/i]

item.title: Newfag here need help! Want to build my very own Base server!
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

You’re not going to create the client from scratch. So just get that idea out of your head. If you want the bare minimum, use the link posted above.

Epic Steve:

You can get the basic 317 client from here; http://www.moparisthebest.com/downloads/srcAllDummysRemoved.tar.gz

You can make a server from scratch, however, if your knowledge of Java/whatever language you want to do it in is limited, then you probably wont get very far.

Read full topic
item.source: Newfag here need help! Want to build my very own Base server!

item.title: Newfag here need help! Want to build my very own Base server!
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

I will help you with any of these goals as my knowledge is quite extensive on the topic. Kind of expecting since I lurked in the models section for 1.5 years.

  • Altar/create terrain and buildings/structures (have a mate with a diploma in 3D Animation)
  • Altar/create models

I have never created terrain, but I know the concept and the tools needed. I also know the concept for making buildings. Models, I know practically everything about.

Edit: Don’t take this as bragging. :o Read it over and realized someone might take it that way…
Also, all cool kids start out wanting to make their own client and server.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Read full topic

item.title: Newfag here need help! Want to build my very own Base server!
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

I posted the exact same topic when I first started: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=464902.0

Read the comments, they might be helpful. 1 year down the line and I’m still stuck on Project Insanity lol. I’ve learnt a lot though, you will probably come back to creating a scratch server in a few years, as you will realise this is out of your grasp for now.

Read full topic
item.source: Newfag here need help! Want to build my very own Base server!

item.title: Newfag here need help! Want to build my very own Base server!
item.dc:creator: @k_a_h_leader Aeolian
item.description:
@k_a_h_leader wrote:

MistaBigBoss:

Remember that you won’t be doing anything from scratch, you will use jagex’s base. And why bother make a client/server, I mean put your time into learning something that can make you some money, some real 3D with a real engine.

If that were his goal he wouldn’t be on this site.

Read full topic

item.title: Newfag here need help! Want to build my very own Base server!
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

[quote=“Onslaught, post:6, topic:392188”][quote author=ollie123 link=topic=489352.msg3577682#msg3577682 date=1303553720]
Server Help

I suggest you read up on the 317 protocol, the basic aspects of Java and Java socket programming.
[/quote]
Thanks mate!

You can get the basic 317 client from here; http://www.moparisthebest.com/downloads/srcAllDummysRemoved.tar.gz

Thanks, but like I said in original post, I don’t want someone else’s work.[/quote]
It’s not someone elses work. It is the ORIGINAL 317 client (Well, a few variables and classes have been renamed and stuff). It’s nothing like anything in the download section it doesn’t have any new items or shit… As I said, it’s original.

Read full topic
